name: Wayne Young
text: Excellent auction service, great customer service.

name: anonymous
text: We contacted them several times to get some information and the person answering is very rude. We had some general questions before booking anything and we could hear them just slamming the phone to hang up.

name: Amy Kibbey
text: These guys are very knowledgeable and are willing to explain things.  The prices are reasonable.

name: Michael Dobbins
text: Very friendly guys.  Gave me a fair price on my metal.  I would recommend this place to anyone looking to get a fair price on their precious metals.

name: Seth Hicks
text: lol hi mom im on googel

name: Dennis Jordan
text: Really like going into and purchasing at Alabama Coin. Good prices, plenty to look at and choose from. It's like going into a good museum. You can learn a lot. Charles is great with collectible items of all kinds and doesn't mind giving some facts about some of the items. Really interesting. I've recommended the store to friends. He took the time to find a particular date on some coins I was looking for. Very helpful.

name: Sloan Champion
text: Great place Charlie is as nice as they come,fun place to check out

name: Erica Green
text: Won't go anywhere else.

name: Barry Gibbons
text: He is helpful to beginner..

name: David Webb
text: Charles is one of the most experienced and one of the most highly accurate coin and currency graders in the coin business.   I highly recommend him because his judgement comes with details where as most coin graders send you away without an explanation.  The only trusted dealer in the Huntsville area that can be fully trusted.

name: frankie allen
text: Charles has been more than helpful. This guy came to the store to meet with me while he was sick with the flu because I had called and set up an appointment with him a few days before. He could have easily stood me up and justifiably so. That's service for you!

name: Brad Holt
text: Very fair and extremely knowledgeable. Great to do business with buying and selling.

name: atwell rogers
text: This coin shop is by far the best one I’ve been into. Large variety compared to other shops I’ve been to.

name: jabba wakie
text: Have tired 4 times to look inside this coin shop, no one is ever there, no one answers the phone... obviously no one there cares about doing any kind of business.

resp.text:
Days and hours for May are M-W-F 1:00 to 5:00
We will reassess  the current situation on June 1st to see
If we will be reopened full time.  Thank you

name: Rebecca Compton
text: This is a great place to go find all sorts of special collectable's  and friendly service.

name: James Hamilton
text: Interesting store if you are into unusual collectibles, coins and paper money.

name: Brian Doubrava
text: Great Variety and Great Prices

name: Kody Brown
text: I would give this company zero stars if I could?  I tried to reschedule our appointment and Mr. Shelley didn't really want to accommodate that request. I tried to talk me into keeping the original appointment instead of rescheduling so that it would fit my schedule.  But, when I decided to cancel he seemed to be thrilled about that.  Two thumbs down.

name: Susan Scott
text: Wiregrass Appraisal Services are professional and knowledgable. They are there to answer all your questions and make the appraisal process as seamless as possible. I would recommend Wiregrass Appraisal Service to anyone needing an appraisal.

name: Jamie Shertzer
text: These are great guys with over 40 years experience between these two.

name: Jennifer Johnson
text: Wiregrass Appraisals was very easy to work with, responded in a timely manner, and provided a great service. We would use him again!

name: Gary Fain
text: Would not recommend.  Cost my family $$$.

name: Aaron Wyse
text: Caution, avoid these people.  my home appraisal came in approximately 30% below projections based on recent upgrades and previous appraisal from 2003.  Based on their numbers, the Real Estate market in the Wiregrass is collapsing, my home is supposedly worth 14% less now than in 2003, after spending $18,000 in upgrades to the property over the last few years.

name: Rev. Robert Lee
text: Horrible. Terrible. BEWARE! they appraised my house for thousands less than we were selling it for. They cost my family a lot of money when we needed it. They were nit picky and kept requiring more and more inspections. If you see this business turn and run the other way.
